items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Stunning Dress
items.body: This is the most beautiful dress I have ever worn. It was literally red carpet worthy & it turned heads. So soft & well made. It is so flattering & comfortable. I couldnâ€™t get it in the large so went with size 0XL so I did have to alter it a bit myself. I took in the sides at the top & shortened the sleeve at my shoulder to make it fit nice & snug in the chest. The dress was too long in the front so I cut some of the tool & hem, but left it long on the sides & back. It was the perfect little train in the back & the material is very forgiving so you can cut it & never tell. I got so many compliments & I will definitely wear it again to another event! I got the 0XL I am 5â€™3â€ 185 lbs Read more
items.author: Melissa Deaton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly complimented dress
items.body: Beautiful dress that was comfortable to wear and better quality than I expected. It did take a little effort to de-wrinkle the ruffles, but I think that's more of a that-kind-of-fabric-quirk than a this-dress-quirk. I'm short (5'3") so even with heels on this dress was touch the floor long. I did feel like it fit true to size. I originally sized up and ended up exchanging for my actual size (XXL to xl). The bow pieces for the shoulder are long and could be tied in many ways. I meant to get assistance in actually tying mine in a prettier bow rather than the quick one I threw it into but forgot. The thigh slit didn't feel super obvious to me at all, and actually had trouble finding it some. The inner liner of the skirt and top layer with the ruffles have the slit in the same place but move around differently so theyre not always 100% lined up. It was easy to lift the dress and walk up/downstairs or wherever. Read more
items.author: Kelsey M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Long, good quality but not supportive
items.body: True to size. Color was accurate. Dress is pretty, length requires heals or altering to shorten. Wish there was better support of options for support on the strapless side-I felt like I was going to fall out the entire time Read more
items.author: Mallory Mathias

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning! Great choice for tall ladies
items.body: This dress is incredible. I am 6' tall, and have almost never had a dress actually reach my ankles -- in 2 inch heels, this dress reached the floor! Having a proper length dress is a novel at my height, and the fit was true to size. The cup on the side without the strap had a great silicone band, and as a 44H, I was able to wear this dress comfortably and support with only the use of some KT tape to hold the girls up. The tulle is beautiful and the liner is smooth and not itchy. The dress is thick and textured enough to hide any problem areas/belly bulge that might make you self conscious. I was wildly impressed with this dress and received compliments on it all night. Read more
items.author: Ange221

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very very long!
items.body: Way too long and the fabric stuck out in a weird way. Also the tie at the top did not lay like the picture. Might work if you were willing to get some alterations. Read more
items.author: Tiffany M Lipscomb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very long
items.body: The dress is beautiful ðŸ˜ and not very heavy even though it's got a lot of fabric. It is VERY long I'm 5'9 and it still drags on the floor . Overall very satisfied with the fit and comfort level Read more
items.author: Amazon user

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: â€‹I bought this dress for a formal event, and I am absolutely blown away! The quality is incredible, and the design is even more beautiful in person. The one shoulder detail is so chic, and with the high slit made me feel like a queen. As a plus size woman, I truly appreciate how flattering and comfortable this gown is. It fit true to size and required no alterations. I received compliments all night long! Highly recommend this for any wedding, prom, or special evening party. Read more
items.author: Heather Sue

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: This is a beautiful dress and seems to be of good quality-especially for the price. The color is just as pictured. I held off one star because the dress ran way too big and the fabric was too scratchy for me to wear to a wedding. Unfortunately I have to return it but returns were very easy. Sorry that it didnâ€™t work for me. But I would still recommend. Maybe size down one. Read more
items.author: Heather

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening One Shoulder Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening One Shoulder Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: #1 Dark Green, #1 Light Blue, #1 Navy Blue, #1 Wine Red, #1 Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
